column3: On  a  perusal  of the  evidence  I  find  that  no  contradictions  were
that  no  doubt  was  created  by  the

column2: defence on the evidence of the prosecution.

column3: For the  afore  stated  reasons  I am  not inclined  to  set aside a well
considered judgment. The judgment dated 26/03/2009 is affirmed.
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
